universal_events.name: Reading Week for 12 Week Summer Semester
universal_events.description: Study break, 12-week summer semester, except Bachelor of Education.

universal_events.name: Reading Week for 6 Week Spring Semester
universal_events.description: Spring six-week semester study break, no scheduled academic activities.

universal_events.name: Reading Week for 6 Week Summer Semester
universal_events.description: Summer six-week semester study break, no scheduled academic activities.

universal_events.name: Schedule change deadline 1 (Read Description)
universal_events.description: Last day to drop 12-week summer semester courses and receive a 100 per cent refund of tuition and ancillary fees. Last day to withdraw from six-week spring session courses and receive a 50 per cent refund of tuition fees. Last day to withdraw from six-week spring session courses without academic consequences (i.e., without receiving a grade). Courses dropped after this date will be recorded on the academic transcript with a grade of W to indicate withdrawal.

universal_events.name: Schedule change deadline 2 (Read Description)
universal_events.description: Last day to drop 12-week summer semester courses and receive a 50 per cent refund of tuition fees. Last day to withdraw from 12-week summer semester courses without academic consequences (i.e., without receiving a grade). Courses dropped after this date will be recorded on the academic transcript with a grade of W to indicate withdrawal.

universal_events.name: Schedule change deadline 3 (Read Description)
universal_events.description: Last day to withdraw from six-week spring session courses. Active six-week spring session courses will be graded by instructors.

universal_events.name: Canada Day (No Classes)
universal_events.description: Canada Day, no scheduled academic activities.

universal_events.name: Civic Holiday (No Classes)
universal_events.description: Civic holiday, no scheduled academic activities.
